title: How to Make Greek Zucchini (Courgette) Balls

steps.headline: Peel, grate and squeeze the zucchini, until they are dry enough.
Grate the rest of the vegetables.
Add all the ingredients in a large bowl and knead them well.
Remove from the bowl any water that zucchini may extract.
Use a deep pan to heat the oil on a high fire.
Knead small balls and pan them with flour.
Fry them on both sides, until their color becomes golden brown.

text: Peel, grate and squeeze the zucchini, until they are dry enough.  Grate the rest of the vegetables.  Chop all the fresh herbs.  Add all the ingredients in a large bowl and knead them well.  Remove from the bowl any water that zucchini may extract.  Use a deep pan to heat the oil on a high fire.  Knead small balls and pan them with flour.  Fry them on both sides, until their color becomes golden brown.  Finished.
